commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: What gorgeous weather, zura! The sky is so blue today.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Yeah. The breeze feels nice and the temperature is perfect, too. You couldn't ask for a better day to go on a hike.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Oh, thank goodness. I'm really glad I made all those rain dolls...

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: *Giggle* Thanks! Looks like the gods granted their lovely former angel's wish.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Hmph.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Umi, don't be so grumpy. You don't want the gods to change their minds.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Umi, you've looked borderline furious for a while now. What's wrong, zura?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: What do you mean, what's wrong? We've been here for ten minutes and Kanata still isn't here!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Ten minutes isn't that long.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I wonder what's keeping her. Maybe something happened while she was on her way here?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I haven't gotten any messages from her. This is a little concerning.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I suppose, but remember, it's Kanata we're talking about. It's quite possible that she only just woke up. She could've gotten tired simply thinking about coming out here.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Whatever the case, we need to ask her exactly what happened. We might have to have a little chat later on depending on what she says.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Umi's body is radiating a terrifying black aura!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Hold on, Umi! Look!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: What? K-Kanata!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Morning!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Good morning, Kanata.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Sorry, sorry. I was planning to get here on time, but it took longer than I thought to make this.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Wow, that is one ginormous bag. What's in it?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Lunch! Exercise works up your appetite, right? I made enough of Kanata's Special Hiking Lunch for everyone!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Holy cow! You made all of this yourself, zura?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Of course. I made a lot of food, so don't be shy about eating your fill, okay?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Thank you! Everything you make is delicious. I can't wait to eat it.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Kanata... I can't believe I said those foolish things when you were doing all of this for us.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: What's wrong?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: N-Nothing. Thank you, Kanata.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: No problem! Sorry I didn't text when I started running late.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Looks like everyone's here now.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Yes. Well, we were slightly delayed, but let's get going. Our hike awaits!
